Modern Weapons

Five highly detailed AAA weapons that will blow your socks off. All the models are PBR and ready to use in the next big standalone shooter!

Contains:

  • AK-47
  • M4 Carbine
  • L96 Sniper Rifle
  • 870 Shotgun
  • Pistol (9mm)

Download

You can choose to download the asset right away or wait for later by using the link we have sent to your email.
